trans-unit.note: {0} is the date the application was built

trans-unit.source: Another copy of the application is already running. If you cannot find it, restart your computer.
trans-unit.target: Ya se está ejecutando otra copia del programa. Si no la encuentra, reinicie su computadora.

trans-unit.source: Another copy of {0} is already running. If you cannot find that copy of {0}, restart your computer.
trans-unit.target: Ya se está ejecutando otra copia de {0}. Si no la encuentra, reinicie su computadora.

trans-unit.source: There was a problem starting the application which might require that you restart your computer.
trans-unit.target: Hubo un problema al iniciar el programa. Posiblemente tendrá que reiniciar su computadora.

trans-unit.source: There was a problem starting {0} which might require that you restart your computer.
trans-unit.target: Hubo un problema al iniciar {0}. Posiblemente tendrá que reiniciar su computadora.

trans-unit.source: Waiting for other application to finish...
Select this to prevent copying actual data files into archive
trans-unit.target: Select this to prevent copying actual data files into archive

trans-unit.note: label describes the code for a custom identifier. Translate only 'code'

trans-unit.source: Read about language identifiers on the web
trans-unit.note: text used in the link to a webpage that describes the language identifiers
trans-unit.target: Lee acerca de los identificadores de idiomas en la web

trans-unit.source: There was an error attempting to create the RAMP file.
trans-unit.target: There was an error attempting to create the RAMP file.

trans-unit.source: There was a problem starting process to create IMDI package.
trans-unit.target: There was a problem starting process to create IMDI package.

trans-unit.source: There was an error attempting to create the RAMP/REAP mets file.
trans-unit.target: There was an error attempting to create the RAMP/REAP mets file.

trans-unit.source: There was a problem starting process to create zip file.
trans-unit.target: There was a problem starting process to create zip file.

trans-unit.note: Parameter is the type of archive (e.g., RAMP/IMDI)
This is the heading displayed in the Archive Using IMDI dialog box for the files for the actors/participants
This is the abbreviation for Isle Metadata Initiative (http://www.mpi.nl/imdi/). Typically this probably does not need to be localized.

trans-unit.source: {0} ({1}) is a metadata standard to describe multi-media and multi-modal language resources. The standard provides interoperability for browsable and searchable corpus structures and resource descriptions.
trans-unit.note: Parameter 0 is 'Isle Metadata Initiative' (the first occurrence will be turned into a hyperlink); Parameter 1 is 'IMDI'
trans-unit.target: {0} ({1}) is a metadata standard to describe multi-media and multi-modal language resources. The standard provides interoperability for browsable and searchable corpus structures and resource descriptions.

trans-unit.source: This tool will help you use {0} to archive your {1} data. When the {1} package has been created, you can launch {0} and enter any additional information before doing the actual submission.
trans-unit.note: Parameter 0 is the name of the program that will be launched to further prepare the IMDI data for submission; Parameter 1 is the name of the calling (host) program (SayMore, FLEx, etc.)
trans-unit.target: This tool will help you use {0} to archive your {1} data. When the {1} package has been created, you can launch {0} and enter any additional information before doing the actual submission.

trans-unit.note: Message displayed when an invalid language code is given.
Typically this probably does not need to be localized.

trans-unit.source: The {0} package will be created in {1}.
trans-unit.note: Parameter 0 is 'IMDI'; Parameter 1 is the path where the package is created.

trans-unit.source: The following files will be added to the archive:
trans-unit.target: Los siguientes archivos se añadirán al almacén:

trans-unit.source: {0} is a utility for entering metadata and uploading submissions to SIL's internal archive, REAP. If you have access to this archive, this tool will help you use {0} to archive your {1} data. {2} When the {0} package has been created, you can launch {0} and enter any additional information before doing the actual submission.
trans-unit.note: Parameter 0 is the word 'RAMP' (the first one will be turned into a hyperlink); Parameter 1 is the name of the calling (host) program (SayMore, FLEx, etc.); Parameter 2 is additional app-specifc information.
trans-unit.target: {0} is a utility for entering metadata and uploading submissions to SIL's internal archive, REAP. If you have access to this archive, this tool will help you use {0} to archive your {1} data. {2} When the {0} package has been created, you can launch {0} and enter any additional information before doing the actual submission.

trans-unit.source: The RAMP program cannot be found!
Exported to {0}. This path is now on your clipboard. If you are using Arbil, go to File, Import, then paste this path in.
trans-unit.target: Exported to {0}. This path is now on your clipboard. If you are using Arbil, go to File, Import, then paste this path in.

trans-unit.source: Ready to hand the package to RAMP
trans-unit.target: Ready to hand the package to RAMP

trans-unit.note: Parameter is the type of archive (e.g., RAMP/IMDI)
trans-unit.target: Guardando los archivos en el paquete {0}

trans-unit.source: {0} will be moved to the Recycle Bin.
trans-unit.target: {0} se moverá a la papelera de reciclaje.

trans-unit.source: Select a base folder where the IMDI directory structure should be created.
trans-unit.target: Select a base folder where the IMDI directory structure should be created.

trans-unit.source: Select the program to launch after IMDI package is created
trans-unit.target: Select the program to launch after IMDI package is created
(Por favor envíe esto por correo electrónico a)

trans-unit.note: For more formal cultures, something less cheeky might be better. In most cases, this will be replaced by a more useful message, but there are situations where a user could see this.

trans-unit.source: No se preocupe. Problema no fatal.
trans-unit.note: For more formal cultures, something less cheeky might be better. In most cases, this will be replaced by a more useful message, but there are situations where a user could see this.

trans-unit.source: If you don't care who reads your bug report, you can disregard this notice.
trans-unit.target: Si no le preocupa quién lea su informe de error, puede ignorar este aviso.

trans-unit.source: When you submit a crash report or other issue, it goes into our issue tracking system, "Jira", which is available via the web at https://jira.sil.org/issues.(This is a normal way to handle issues in an open-source project.)
trans-unit.target: Los informes de fallas u otros problemas se ingresan a nuestro sistema de seguimiento de problemas, "Jira", que está disponible a través de la web en https://jira.sil.org/issues. (Esta es una forma normal de manejar problemas en un proyecto de código abierto.)

trans-unit.source: Our issue-tracking system is not searchable by those without an account. Therefore, search engines (like Google) will not find your bug reports.
trans-unit.target: Nuestro sistema de seguimiento de problemas no puede ser buscado por aquellos que no tienen una cuenta. Por lo tanto, los motores de búsqueda (como Google) no encontrarán sus informes de errores.

trans-unit.source: However, anyone can make an account and then read your report. So if you have something private to say, please send it to one of the developers privately with a note that you don't want the issue in our issue tracking system. If necessary, we can make a place-holder for your issue without the private information so the issue can still be tracked and not get lost.
trans-unit.target: Sin embargo, cualquiera puede crear una cuenta y luego leer su informe. Entonces, si su informe contiene algo privado, envíelo mejor en privado directamente a uno de los desarrolladores con una nota de que no desea que el problema aparezca en nuestro sistema de seguimiento de problemas. Si es necesario, podemos crear un marcador de posición para su problema sin la información privada para que aún se pueda rastrear el problema y no perderse.

trans-unit.note: Ampersand is optional, to indicate accelerator key
Ampersand is optional, to indicate accelerator key

trans-unit.target: Enviar mensaje desde mi correo electrónico

trans-unit.note: Ampersand is optional, to indicate accelerator key
Ampersand is optional, to indicate accelerator key

trans-unit.source: To help us fix the problem, we need to gather information on what went wrong.
trans-unit.target: Para ayudarnos a solucionar el problema, necesitamos recopilar información sobre lo que salió mal.

trans-unit.source: Can you list the steps to take to make this happen again, or tell us anything that might be helpful?
trans-unit.target: ¿Puede enumerar los pasos a seguir para que esto vuelva a suceder o indicar algo sobre el escenario que precedió a este problema?

trans-unit.source: Found {0} images with names close to “{1}”
trans-unit.note: The {0} will be replaced by the number of images found. The {1} will be replaced with the search string.
trans-unit.target: Encontró {0} imágenes con nombres parecidos a {1}

trans-unit.note: Used to copy a previous metadata set to the current image. The {0} will be replaced with the name of the exemplar image.

trans-unit.target: Descargar el instalador de Arte de la Lectura (Art of Reading)

trans-unit.source: In the box above, type what you are searching for, then press ENTER.
trans-unit.target: En el cuadro superior, escriba lo que está buscando. A continuación pulse ENTRAR.

trans-unit.note: Title shown for a file chooser dialog brought up by the ImageToolbox

trans-unit.source: Sorry, something went wrong while getting the image.
trans-unit.target: Lo sentimos, algo falló al tratar de obtener la imagen.

trans-unit.source: Sorry, something went wrong with the ImageToolbox
trans-unit.target: Lo sentimos, algo falló con la Caja de Herramientas de Imágenes (ImageToolbox)
Caja de Herramientas de Imágenes (Image Toolbox)

trans-unit.source: Install the Art Of Reading package (this may be very slow)
trans-unit.target: Instalar el paquete de Arte de la Lectura (Art of Reading), (esto puede tardar)

trans-unit.note: The {0} will be replaced by the number of matching images

trans-unit.source: Did you know that there is a new version of this collection which lets you search in Arabic, Bengali, Chinese, English, French, Indonesian, Hindi, Portuguese, Spanish, Thai, or Swahili? It is free and available for downloading.
trans-unit.target: ¿Sabía que hay una nueva versión de esta colección que le permite buscar en arábe, bengalí, chino, inglés, francés, indonesio, hindi, portugués, español, tailandés, o suajili? Es gratuita y está disponible para ser descargada.

trans-unit.source: This computer doesn't appear to have any galleries installed yet.
trans-unit.target: Parece que esta computadora todavía no tiene galerías instaladas.
No se encontraron imágenes que coincidan

trans-unit.note: Shown in the file-picking dialog to describe what kind of files the dialog is filtering for

trans-unit.source: Sorry, there was a problem loading that image.
trans-unit.target: Lastimosamente, no se pudo cargar esa imagen.

trans-unit.source:
This image does not know:

Who created it?
Who can use it?
trans-unit.target:
Esta imagen no sabe:

¿Quién la creó?
¿Quién puede utilizarla?

trans-unit.source: The search box is currently set to {0}
trans-unit.target: Actualmente el cuadro de búsqueda está en {0}

trans-unit.note: In writing system setup when IPA special option is selected: Label for the purpose combo box

trans-unit.source: Read about IPA transcription on the web
trans-unit.note: In writing system setup when IPA special option is selected: text used in link to a webpage describing IPA transcription
trans-unit.target: Lee sobre la transcripción en AFI (Alfabeto Fonético Internacional) en la web

trans-unit.source: This list should include all the ISO-639 languages, including all the alternative names known to ethnologue.com.\n\nIf necessary, use the "Unlisted Language" option, which will be selected for you now.
trans-unit.target: Esta lista debe incluir todos los idiomas de ISO-639, incluidos todos los nombres alternativos conocidos por ethnologue.com.\n\nSi es necesario, utilice la opción "Idioma no enlistado", esta opción será seleccionada ahora.

trans-unit.note: It's ok to change what this shows; the underlying destination will remain ethnologue.com

trans-unit.source: About Language 639-3 Codes & How To Apply For New Ones
trans-unit.target: Acerca de Códigos de Idioma 639-3 y Cómo solicitar nuevos
Acerca del Registro ISO de Idiomas

trans-unit.note: Shown when there are multiple countries and it is just confusing to list them all. {0} is a count of countries.

trans-unit.source: You can change how the language name will be displayed here:
trans-unit.target: Aquí puede cambiar cómo se mostrará el nombre del idioma:

trans-unit.source: Unfortunately, {0} is starting to get short of memory, and may soon slow down or experience other problems. We recommend that you quit and restart it when convenient.
trans-unit.target: Desafortunadamente, {0} no tiene memoria suficiente y podrá desacelerarse o experimentar otros problemas. Recomendamos que cierre y reinicie cuando sea conveniente.

trans-unit.source: Allow commercial uses of your work?
trans-unit.target: ¿Permite hacer uso comercial de su trabajo?
Titular de los derechos de autor
Año de los derechos de autor

trans-unit.source: The copyright holder waives all rights
trans-unit.target: El títular de derchos de autor renuncia todos sus derechos
Crédito, derechos de autor y licencia

trans-unit.source: Contact the copyright holder for any permissions
trans-unit.target: Comuníquese con el titular de los derechos de autor para solicitar permisos

trans-unit.source: Yes, as long as others share alike
trans-unit.target: Sí, mientras que otros compartan igualmente

trans-unit.note: When you choose a Creative Commons License, this label shows over the text box at the bottom.
The meaning of "non-commercial" is vague but important. This hyperlink takes you somewhere that defines it.
{0} is replaced by an untranslatable abbreviation functioning as an adjective ("CC0")

trans-unit.source: Cannot remove the selected project because it is currently open
trans-unit.target: No se puede eliminar el proyecto seleccionado porque está actualmente abierto.
No se puede eliminar de la lista.

trans-unit.source: This may also hide other buttons which are not needed by the non-advanced user.
trans-unit.target: Esto también puede ocultar otros botones que no son necesarios para el usuario no avanzado.

trans-unit.source: The button will show up when you hold down the Ctrl and Shift keys together.
trans-unit.target: El botón se mostrará cuando se mantengan presionadas juntas las teclas Ctrl y Mayús.

trans-unit.source: Hide the button that opens settings.
trans-unit.target: Ocultar el botón que abre la configuración.

trans-unit.source: To prevent accidental changes which could cause this tool to stop working for you, these settings have been locked.
trans-unit.target: Estas configuraciones han sido bloquedas para prevenir cambios accidentales que podrían impedir el funcionamiento de esta herramienta.

trans-unit.source: Factory password for these settings is "{0}". If you forget it, you can always visit the {1} support page.
trans-unit.note: The localization for this should be kept in sync with "SettingsProtection.PasswordNoticeWithSupportUrl". Param 0: Factory password; Param 1: product name
trans-unit.target: La contraseña de fábrica para estas configuraciones es "{0}". Si la olvida, siempre puede visitar la página de apoyo de {1}.

trans-unit.source: Factory password for these settings is "{0}". If you forget it, you can always visit the {1} support page: {2}
trans-unit.note: The localization for this should be kept in sync with "SettingsProtection.PasswordNotice". Param 0: Factory password; Param 1: product name; Param 2: URL of support page
trans-unit.target: La contraseña de fábrica para estas configuraciones es "{0}". Si la olvida, siempre puede visitar la página de apoyo {1} en: {2}

trans-unit.source: Require the factory password to get into settings.
trans-unit.target: Se requiere la contraseña de fábrica para entrar en la configuración.

trans-unit.source: In applications which support this option, fields with this input system will be able to play and record voice.
trans-unit.note: Displayed if a user selects the voice special option in writing system setup
trans-unit.target: En las aplicaciones que soportan esta opción, los campos con esta sistema de ingreso podrán grabar y reproducir la voz.

trans-unit.source: (The selected font is not available on this machine. Using default.)
trans-unit.target: (La fuente seleccionada no está disponible en esta computadora. Se usará la fuente predeterminada.)

trans-unit.source: This is a &right to left writing system.
trans-unit.target: Esto es una &escritura de derecha a izquierda.

trans-unit.note: In writing system setup general tab: label before abbreviation text box
In writing system setup general tab: Label before combo box with 'Special' choices
Only translate text inside of the parentheses ()
Only translate text inside of the parentheses ()

trans-unit.source: If the keyboard you need is not listed, click the appropriate link below to set it up
trans-unit.target: Si el teclado que necesita no está en la lista, haga clic en el enlace apropiado abajo para configurarlo

trans-unit.source: Keyman 5.0 or later is not Installed.
trans-unit.target: Keyman 5.0 o más reciente no está instalado.

trans-unit.source: Select the &keyboard with which to type {0} text
trans-unit.target: Seleccione el &teclado con el cual desea ingresar texto {0}

trans-unit.source: &Test Area (Use this area to type something to test out your keyboard.)
trans-unit.target: &Área de prueba (Utilice esta zona para escribir algo para probar el teclado.)
No se puede conectar al SLDR

trans-unit.source: The application is unable to connect to the SIL Locale Data Repository to retrieve the latest information about this language. If you create this writing system, the default settings might be incorrect or out of date. Are you sure you want to create a new writing system?
trans-unit.target: La aplicación no puede conectarse con la base datos de SIL para obtener la información más reciente acerca de este idioma. Si usted crea este sistema escritura, la configuración predeterminada podría ser incorrecta u obsoleta. ¿Realmente desea crear un nuevo sistema de escritura?
